	</div>

Form 001 Modal Compiled

Отправить заявку
Форма
Добавить комментарий
Отправить заявку
BEM JSON
{
  "block": "m-container",
  "content": {
    "row": true,
    "utils": [
      "one-line--top-bottom"
    ],
    "content": [
      {
        "block": "form001",
        "mods": ["transform-in-modal"],
        "content": [
          {
            "elem": "popup-button-wrap",
            "content": [ 
              {
                "elem": "popup-button",
                "cls": "form-popup-button button-simple", 
                "content": "Отправить заявку",
                "editable": true,
                "attrs": 
                  {
                    "data-button": "form001-modal"
                  },
                "link": true
              }
            ]
          },
          {
            "elem": "form",
            "cls": "popup-alone",
            "attrs": 
              {
                "data-modal": "form001-modal"
              },
            "content": [
              {
                "elem": "title",
                "utils": [
                  "no-margin--top"
                ],
                "content": "Форма",
                "editable": true
              },
              {
                "elem": "close",
                "cls": "close-modal",
                "link": true
              },
              {
                "elem": "line",
                "editableGroup": "line-1",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "editableGroup": "col-1",
                    "editable": true,
                    "html": ""
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "elem": "line",
                "editableGroup": "line-2",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "editableGroup": "col-2",
                    "editable": true,
                    "html": ""
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "elem": "line",
                "editableGroup": "line-3",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "editableGroup": "col-3",
                    "editable": true,
                    "html": ""
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "elem": "line",
                "editableGroup": "line-4",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "editableGroup": "col-4",
                    "content": [
                      {
                        "elem": "link-hide-line",
                        "cls": ["form-link-hide-line"],
                        "content": "Добавить комментарий",
                        "editable": true,
                        "link": true
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "elem": "line",
                "cls": ["form-hide-line"],
                "editableGroup": "line-5",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "editableGroup": "col-5",
                    "editable": true,
                    "html": ""
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "elem": "line",
                "editableGroup": "line-6",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "editableGroup": "col-6",
                    "content": [
                      {
                        "elem": "button",
                        "cls": "button-simple",
                        "content": "Отправить заявку",
                        "link": true,
                        "editable": true
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                ]
              }
            ]
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
<div class="m-container" data-bem-match="m-container">
	<div class="m-row g__one-line--top-bottom">
		<div class="form001 form001--transform-in-modal" data-bem-match="form001">
			<div class="form001__popup-button-wrap" data-bem-match="form001__popup-button-wrap"><a class="form001__popup-button form-popup-button button-simple" data-button="form001-modal" href="#" data-bem-match="form001__popup-button">Отправить заявку</a></div>
			<div class="form001__form popup-alone" data-modal="form001-modal" data-bem-match="form001__form">
				<div class="form001__title g__no-margin--top" data-bem-match="form001__title">Форма</div>
				<a class="form001__close close-modal" href="#" data-bem-match="form001__close"></a>
				<div class="form001__line" data-bem-match="form001__line">
					<div class="form001__col" data-bem-match="form001__col"><label class='form-label'>Ваше имя</label><input class='form-input' type='text' placeholder='Ваше имя'></div>
				</div>
				<div class="form001__line" data-bem-match="form001__line">

				</div>
				<div class="form001__line form-hide-line" data-bem-match="form001__line">
					<div class="form001__col" data-bem-match="form001__col"><label class='form-label'>Текст комментария</label><textarea class='form-textarea' type='text' placeholder='Текст комментария'></textarea></div>
				</div>

				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Form 002 Compiled

Форма
Отправить заявку
BEM JSON
{
  "block": "m-container",
  "content": {
    "row": true,
    "utils": [
      "one-line--top-bottom"
    ],
    "content": [
      {
        "block": "form002",
        "content": [
          {
            "elem": "form",
            "content": [
              {
                "elem": "title",
                "utils": [
                  "no-margin--top"
                ],
                "content": "Форма",
                "editable": true
              },
              {
                "elem": "line",
                "editableGroup": "line-1",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "mods": ["half-left"],
                    "editableGroup": "col-1",
                    "editable": true,
                    "html": ""
                  },
                  {
                    "elem": "col",
                    "mods": ["half-right"],
                    "editableGroup": "col-2",
                    "editable": true,

Далее

BEM JSON
{
  "block": "m-container",
  "content": {
    "row": true,
    "utils": [
      "one-line--top-bottom"
    ],
    "content": [
      {
        "block": "form006",
        "content": [
          {
            "elem": "wrap",
            "content": [
              {
                "elem": "title",
                "content": "Регистрация",
                "editable": true
              },
              {
                "elem": "step",
                "mods": ["active"],
                "attrs": 
                  {
                    "data-index": "1"
                  },
                "editableGroup": "step-1",
                "content": [
                  {
                    "elem": "title-step",
                    "content": "Оставьте заявку и получите вкусную печеньку",
